name: A lot of Magic
description:
You play as a young wizard in a magic, dark world and have to find your way through different puzzles, by gathering magic from magical wisps and shooting it to lighten the world!

Controls
A/D/Left Arrow/Right Arrow - Horizontal Movement
Spacebar - Jump
LMB - Shoot Magic
RMB - Focus
Mouse Position - Direction to Shoot / Direction to Focus

The game is still buggy and very short, but it should showcase the concept. Besides it was made for the Quarantine Jam and is a bit rushed.

Have fun and thank you for playing. Feedback is appreciated!
